allow: Bash(for dir in departments faculty-assignments permissions results scraper settings students subjects vtu-settings)
Bash(timeout 5 bash -c 'while ! curl -s http://localhost:3000 > /dev/null; do sleep 1; done; echo ""Server ready""')
Bash(timeout 5 bash -c 'while ! curl -s http://localhost:8001 > /dev/null; do sleep 1; done; echo ""Django ready""')
Bash(timeout 3 bash -c 'while ! curl -s http://localhost:5001 > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 0.5; done; echo ""Service ready""')
